# shorts

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Shorts is R package that create profiles using the split times or the radar gun data of the short sprints (<6sec)

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/mladenjovanovic/shorts) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mladenjovanovic/shorts")

require(shorts)
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
require(shorts)
## basic example code
```
